subject: AccuWeather.com Alert(tm) Advisory  (avcavc)
body:
AccuWeather.com Alert[TM]






















 







							Severe Watches and Warnings for BEVERLY HILLS 













LOXCFWLOX
WHUS46 KLOX 260436
CFWLOX

COASTAL HAZARD MESSAGE
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE LOS ANGELES/OXNARD CA
936 PM PDT WED APR 25 2007

..HIGH SURF EXPECTED ON EXPOSED WEST FACING SHORES...

SURF WILL BUILD AND STRONG RIP CURRENTS WILL DEVELOP TONIGHT ALONG
EXPOSED WEST FACING SHORES. THE HAZARDOUS NEARSHORE CONDITIONS ARE
LIKELY THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON. THIS LARGE NORTHWEST SWELL WILL
BRING THE HIGHEST SURF CONDITIONS TO THE COASTAL AREAS OF SAN LUIS
OBISPO AND WESTERN SANTA BARBARA COUNTIES. DUE TO THE LONGER PERIOD
OF THE SWELL...SOME OF THIS ENERGY WILL SPREAD INTO THE INNER
COASTAL WATERS...RESULTING IN HIGHER THAN NORMAL SURF CONDITIONS
ACROSS WEST FACING BEACHES OF LOS ANGELES AND VENTURA COUNTIES.

CAZ034-035-261100-
/O.CON.KLOX.SU.Y.0007.000000T0000Z-070426T2200Z/
SAN LUIS OBISPO COUNTY CENTRAL COAST-
SANTA BARBARA COUNTY CENTRAL COAST-
936 PM PDT WED APR 25 2007

..HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PDT THURSDAY...

A HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PDT THURSDAY.

BREAKERS BETWEEN 10 AND 13 FEET WILL LIKELY CONTINUE THROUGH THURSDAY
AFTERNOON...WITH HIGHEST SURF CONDITIONS ON WEST AND NORTHWEST FACING
BEACHES.

A HIGH SURF ADVISORY MEANS THAT HIGH SURF WILL AFFECT BEACHES IN THE
ADVISORY AREA...PRODUCING STRONG RIP CURRENTS AND LOCALIZED BEACH
EROSION. ALL PERSONS SHOULD BE AWARE OF THE RISKS ASSOCIATED WITH
WATER RELATED ACTIVITIES AND USE EXTREME CAUTION WHEN ENTERING THE
OCEAN. WHEN IN DOUBT...JUST STAY OUT.

$$

CAZ040-041-046-261100-
/O.NEW.KLOX.CF.S.0006.070426T0436Z-070426T2200Z/
VENTURA COUNTY COAST-
LOS ANGELES COUNTY COAST INCLUDING DOWNTOWN LOS ANGELES-
SANTA MONICA MOUNTAINS RECREATIONAL AREA-
936 PM PDT WED APR 25 2007

..HIGHER THAN NORMAL SURF TO CONTINUE...

BREAKERS BETWEEN 4 AND 6 FEET WILL BE COMMON ACROSS WEST FACING BEACHES
OF LOS ANGELES AND VENTURA COUNTIES THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON...WITH
LOCALLY HIGHER SETS LIKELY ACROSS WELL EXPOSED AREAS.

THE HIGHER THAN NORMAL SURF CONDITIONS WILL LIKELY PRODUCE STRONG RIP
CURRENTS. ALL PERSONS SHOULD BE AWARE OF THE RISKS ASSOCIATED WITH
WATER RELATED ACTIVITIES AND USE EXTREME CAUTION WHEN ENTERING THE
OCEAN. WHEN IN DOUBT...JUST STAY OUT.


$$

GOMBERG
